SQL集合1

FunkyRicky

# mysql查询文章的评论数量

两张表：文章表和评论表

文章表(article)：id
评论表(comment)：id,c_aid

要求：查询出所有文章及评论数量然后降序显示（没有评论的文章的评论数量则返回为0）
1
2
3
4
5
6
SQL

SELECT article.*, comment.*, COUNT(comment.id) AS num FROM article LEFT JOIN comment ON article.id = comment.artid WHERE 条件 GROUP BY article.id ORDER BY article.id desc

# 先判断记录是否存在，不存在则将记录插入表的sql语句 用insert ...select一条sql语句完成

语句1：
insert into User(Name)
select "张三"
where not exists(select UserId from User where Name="张三")


语句2：
insert into task_fav(taskid,opid,opdate)
select @taskid,@opid,getdate()
where not exists (select taskid from task_fav where taskid=@taskid and opid=@opid)

# MySQL 多表关联一对多查询实现取最新一条数据的方法示例

SQL

# 客户表(customer) 和 订单表(order_info)

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `customer`;
CREATE TABLE `customer` (
	`id` BIGINT NOT NULL COMMENT '客户ID',
	`real_name` VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL COMMENT '客户名字',
	`create_time` DATETIME NOT NULL COMMENT '创建时间',
	PRIMARY KEY(`id`)
)ENGINE=INNODB DEFAULT CHARSET = UTF8 COMMENT '客户信息表';

-- DATA FOR TABLE customer

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `order_info`;
CREATE TABLE `order_info` (
	`id` BIGINT NOT NULL COMMENT '订单ID',
	`industry` VARCHAR(255) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '所属行业',
 `nature_tax` VARCHAR(255) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '纳税性质',
	`customer_id` VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL COMMENT '客户ID',
	`create_time` DATETIME NOT NULL COMMENT '创建时间',
	PRIMARY KEY(`id`)
)ENGINE=INNODB DEFAULT CHARSET = UTF8 COMMENT '订单信息表';

-- DATA FOR TABLE order_info

# 重点SQL语句

SELECT
	cr.id,
	cr.real_name,
	oi.industry,
	oi.nature_tax
FROM
	customer AS cr
LEFT JOIN (
	SELECT a.industry, a.nature_tax, a.customer_id, a.create_time FROM order_info AS a
	LEFT JOIN (
		SELECT MAX(id) AS id, customer_id FROM order_info GROUP BY customer_id
	) AS b ON a.customer_id = b.customer_id
WHERE a.id = b.id
) AS oi ON oi.customer_id = cr.id;
1

# Sql语句显示表备注，字段备注等信息

SQL
SHOW DATABASES                                   //列出 MySQL Server 数据库。

SHOW TABLES [FROM db_name]                       //列出数据库数据表。

SHOW TABLE STATUS [FROM db_name]                 //列出数据表及表状态信息。

SHOW COLUMNS FROM tbl_name [FROM db_name]        //列出资料表字段

SHOW FULL COLUMNS FROM tbl_name [FROM db_name]   //列出字段及详情

SHOW FULL FIELDS FROM tbl_name [FROM db_name]    //列出字段完整属性

SHOW INDEX FROM tbl_name [FROM db_name]          //列出表索引。

SHOW STATUS                                      //列出 DB Server 状态。

SHOW VARIABLES                                   //列出 MySQL 系统环境变量。

SHOW PROCESSLIST                                 //列出执行命令。

SHOW GRANTS FOR user                             //列出某用户权限

# SQL查出一张表中重复的记录

SQL
参数说明
select * from 表名 AS 别名 Where (别名.查询重复的字段名) in (select 查询重复的字段名 from 表名 group by 查询重复的字段名 having count(*) > 1) 

语句结构
select * from am_business bus where (bus.mobile) in (select mobile from am_business group by mobile having count(*) > 1)

查询重复的次数
select count(mobile) as '重复次数',mobile from am_business group by mobile  having count(*)>1 order by mobile desc
